channel.title: Newb Questions
channel.description:
Now bear with me, I am a noob. So, I had an interest in making a Runescape private server, but first, 1.) How do I make a register page? 2.) How do I make it so not everyone is a mod upon login? 3.) How do I put the client in the web?
I know how to port foward and all that garbage so I'm not a complete noob :D. Please help and thanks!
